pitchSetupSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Pitch Setup Page

This page contains all the pitches you have created.

Pitches for You

This page will have pitches that you have been invited to as a panelist to rate learners.
This tab shows the number of pitches you have created.
This tab shows the number of pitches you have been invited to.
This contains all the pitches you have been invited to as a panelist.
This contains all the pitches you have created.
You can create a new pitch by clicking on this button
This is a pitch card. Clicking on it allows you to view the learners and panelists of this particular pitch.
This is a pitch card. Clicking on it takes you to the page where you can rate the learners of this particular pitch.
